body: I'm wondering if we should allow converting Variables that require grad to numpy. It might make it easy for people to shoot themselves in the foot because they will think that we can also differentiate numpy code, which isn't true.
body_html: I'm wondering if we should allow converting Variables that require grad to numpy. It might make it easy for people to shoot themselves in the foot because they will think that we can also differentiate numpy code, which isn't true.
